Some Day's of our Life, are so special that like in a dream, memories flash by. My Special Day was when I started Working with TCS.
This was in November 2009, at ILP(Initial Learning Program) Trivandrum.I remember as if it was yesterday.
60 of us joined on the same day. We Travelled, Worked and Pondered together !!
Today we barely meet, but these memories are what never lets us feel apart
I have, in a couple of verses, tried to capture my first "Face Off" with the corporate world.

Days At ILP- TRIVANDRUM !!

Above the winds and beyond the street,
Into a new world of DREAM and Stream, I put my foot like a victorious Queen!!

Buildings so tall, Room-mates obscure,
Morever, Guys Brisking through girls corridor,
Long Queue to Dine,
Here firm heads untear,
Rat Race for once is peacefully played,
And sugar coated words is in each lips, INNATE!!

Lost in a crowd,seeking a cliche,
Is it shadow or real ? Is my everlasting Quest,
On wet grounds,from rain, I put my Foot,
With a hope and a wish of a firm and steady look.

Classes, sessions Are TIRING true ..
Then matured behavior is what they expect from YOU,
Out of your cozy, sleepy eyes,
Here you are ,Like fresh baked bread, In a monkey's fight !!

Immature , Scared to meet strangers, TRUE,
Yet you pose to be calm and cool,
OH ! What a world, What is my quest????????
Is this a dreamy trance, or my life's Reality at its FIRST BEST!!!
